name: Kingdom Of Auroa Demo Ver.1
description:
In this game the player will play as a boy 16 year old boy named Zendrick his goal is to stop the Gov. He lives in a Kingdom called Kingdom Of Auroa, next thing Zendrick knows is that the Gov are using gasses to turn people into demons. Join Zendrick and help him stop the Gov!!! (This game is still in testing) Also used

Pheonix KageDesu Alpha ABS. Build 980 for this game. Link to there YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA3R61ojF5vp5tGwJ1YqdgQ
